title: Trygg.es
description: A static website built for a small keyholding and home service company in Spain, showcasing services, pricing, and contact information.
features: Clear presentation of services and pricing
process: Created the visual design in Figma, crafted the website copy, and developed the site with Next.js, React, and Tailwind to deliver a clean and responsive presentation.
learning_outcomes: Learned how to translate a company's brand and values into a functional website, adapting design and tone to suit the client and their audience.

title: Where it's @
description: A mobile-first React app built as a school project, showcasing local music events. The task was to implement a Figma design with pixel-perfect accuracy while adding custom touches like a dynamic menu.
features: Dynamic event listings fetched from an API
Modular component structure following best practices
process: Implemented the frontend from a Figma mockup, handled state management with Zustand, integrated Material UI and external libraries, and ensured pixel-perfect mobile UI.
learning_outcomes: Learned to translate detailed designs into responsive React components, manage complex state with Zustand, and integrate third-party libraries to enhance functionality and user experience.

title: Airbean API
description: A school project where the first part involved building a backend REST API for a fictional coffee delivery service as a group, followed by an individual extension creating protected admin endpoints for menu management.
features: CRUD operations for menu, orders, and accounts
Admin endpoints for managing menu items
process: Contributed to building the initial group API and independently implemented admin endpoints with secure access, input validation, and Swagger documentation.
learning_outcomes: Gained experience in backend development, RESTful API design, database management with MongoDB, and agile teamwork practices. Learned to implement authentication, role-based access control, and documentation for APIs.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: My own portfolio website built to showcase projects and skills, designed with a personal aesthetic while exploring advanced React techniques and animations with Motion.
features: Custom design and layout created from scratch
Smooth animations and transitions using Motion
Dynamic project rendering from JSON data
process: Responsible for the full design and development of the site, focusing on user experience, responsive layout, and implementing smooth animations with Motion.
learning_outcomes: Enhanced my skills in React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and animation with Motion, while practicing translating design ideas into functional web components.
